intro: Orthaea abbreviata, commonly known as the short-stemmed orthaea, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its upright, branched stems and small, clustered leaves. The plant produces tiny, greenish-white flowers that bloom in late summer. It is typically found in rocky or gravelly soils in arid or semi-arid regions. Orthaea abbreviata is a low-growing perennial that is well adapted to harsh environmental conditions.
